p:
Life table parameters were calculated as described by Birch
57 . Adult age (x), age-specific survival rates (l x) and number of offspring produced per female per day (m x) were determined for all female aphids used in the study. The life table parameters, gross reproductive rate (GRR = ∑m x), net reproductive rate (Ro = ∑l xm x), mean generation time (GT = ∑ (l xm xx)/∑ (l xm x) or GT = ln(Ro)/r), intrinsic rate of increase (r m) (∑e- rxl xm x = 1), finite rate of increase (λ F = e r) and doubling time (DT = ln(2)/r) were calculated.
